top_comments.comment: Lucario: "Not yet, Ash! I can do this!"
Leon would have gotten there sooner, but he got lost, lol...

comments_since_last_sample.body: Leon would have gotten there sooner, but he got lost, lol...

The pros:
Finally getting ash Pokémon team being together
Ashs lucario being his own trainer to await mega evolution
Cons:ashs battling here is too off. He gets both Pikachu and lucario to close in multiple times despite both of them getting trapped in the past going against her
I didn't like how lucario was being used here. He's being used to fight 3 Pokémon in a row despite supposedly being the ace in the fight for mega evolution. Against valkner it was fine because gengar was down and Pikachu had to save more energy for later on. You would think he'd use lucario a bit less for the battle until came down against dynamax.
Seeing My Gal Korrina was indeed an sweet treat Lucario must be faking all those injuries ash was trying to save him but Lucario no I got this minor setback

My only complaint with the episode is that the preview last week showed them Mega Evolving and using Gigantamax as a bait. Not really a deal breaker per se, just a little annoying that literally the footage shown didn’t even match the episode
Pokemon Journeys is finally living up to part of it's potential
Where do you watch these episodes?
Wait but ash lucario didnt have his mega stone braclet with him how he was supposed to mega evolve without mega stone?

the Machamp clobbering
reminded me of when Guzma's Golisopod attacked Lana's Primarina
Though we really need a new opening foe journeys hahahahhahahhaha
I'm so happy this is a 2-episode fight. Also, I bet there's gonna be tons of Korrina x Bea art now lol
Since we know Leon’s going to be in the next episode, I wonder if we’ll see Hop as well. This was a great episode
Yes can't wait for the next episode
The segment where they were eating sweets together was so wholesome. I love the way the chocolate looks. SO DELICIOUS!😋
Now the series rank average is 6.64

Even though, this is just a short review, it tells me everything I need to know




In like 2 minutes

Ash's Top 3 Best Journeysmons:
